title: IRRGN: An Implicit Relational Reasoning Graph Network for Multi-turn Response Selection. (arXiv:2212.00482v2 [cs.CL] UPDATED)
abstract: The task of response selection in multi-turn dialogue is to find the best option from all candidates. In order to improve the reasoning ability of the model, previous studies pay more attention to using explicit algorithms to model the dependencies between utterances, which are deterministic, limited and inflexible. In addition, few studies consider differences between the options before and after reasoning. In this paper, we propose an Implicit Relational Reasoning Graph Network to address these issues, which consists of the Utterance Relational Reasoner (URR) and the Option Dual Comparator (ODC). URR aims to implicitly extract dependencies between utterances, as well as utterances and options, and make reasoning with relational graph convolutional networks. ODC focuses on perceiving the difference between the options through dual comparison, which can eliminate the interference of the noise options. translated_title: IRRGN: 一种用于多轮响应选择的隐式关系推理图网络
translated_abstract: 在多轮对话中，响应选择的任务是从所有候选项中找到最佳选项。为了提高模型的推理能力，先前的研究更关注使用明确的算法来建模话语之间的依赖关系，这些关系是确定性的、有限的和不灵活的。此外，很少有研究考虑到推理之前和之后选项之间的差异。在本文中，我们提出了一种隐式关系推理图网络来解决这些问题，它由话语关系推理器（URR）和选项双重比较器（ODC）组成。URR的目标是隐式提取话语之间以及话语和选项之间的依赖关系，并使用关系图卷积网络进行推理。ODC专注于通过双重比较感知选项之间的差异，从而排除噪声选项的干扰。在两个多轮对话推理基准数据集MuTual上进行的实验结果表明，提出的方法在响应选择任务上取得了显著的性能提升。
tldr: 本研究提出了一种名为IRRGN的隐式关系推理图网络，用于解决多轮对话中的响应选择任务。该网络利用关系图卷积网络隐式提取话语之间以及话语和选项之间的依赖关系，并通过双重比较感知选项之间的差异，取得了显著的性能提升。
en_tdlr: This paper proposes an Implicit Relational Reasoning Graph Network (IRRGN) for multi-turn response selection in dialogue. The network utilizes relational graph convolutional networks to implicitly extract dependencies between utterances and options, and utilizes dual comparison to perceive the difference between options, achieving significant performance improvement.
